## PBPrimitiveTypeInfo.resizeType() method

Creates a new primitive type info by changing row and column of this type

**Signature:**

```typescript
resizeType(rows: number, cols: number): PBPrimitiveType;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rows | number | The new value of row |
|  cols | number | The new value of column |

**Returns:**

[PBPrimitiveType](doc/markdown/./device.pbprimitivetype.md)

The new primitive type
